isis.stitle: TSI 04-12-03R - Release Of Three New International® I-6 Diesel Engine Turbocharger Oil Supply Tube Service Items

subjectgroup.subject: Release Of Three New International® I-6 Diesel Engine Turbocharger Oil Supply Tube Service Items

figure.caption: Figure 1. 1/4 Inch NPTF Turbocharger Oil Connector Assembly With O-Ring

geninfo.para: A new 1/4 inch NPTF thread turbocharger oil connector assembly (part number 1850084C91 - connector and O-ring) has been released. This correctly mounts the flexible turbocharger oil supply tube to the oil cooler header. This new connector assembly is to be used on diesel engines with serial numbers 931164 through 1452885, (excluding the diesel engines listed in the note). The 1/4 inch NPTF thread oil connector is available separately or in the updated turbocharger oil supply tube kit (part number 1842907C92). Refer to instruction sheet part number 1171819R2, within the kit, for correct installation procedure.

note.para: This 1/4 inch turbocharger oil connector assembly is NOT used on the following applications:

item.para: DT 466 and DT 530 diesel engines with serial numbers 1194039 and up and equipped with an EVRT® turbocharger.
DT 466, DT 570, and HT 570 diesel engines with serial numbers 2,000,001 and up.

geninfo.para: The turbocharger oil feed tube kit (part number 1842907C91) contained a flexible turbocharger oil inlet tube, seals, and fitting which replaced the rigid turbocharger oil supply tube. An updated turbocharger oil supply tube kit (part number 1842907C92) has been released. The updated kit added the 1/4 inch NPTF turbocharger oil connector assembly. Depending on engine application, either the 1/4 inch NPTF connector assembly or the oil fitting assembly will be used (not both).

figure.caption: Figure 2. Turbocharger Oil Supply Tube Kit (1842907C92)

calloutgroup.callout1: Turbocharger oil connector assembly (1/4 inch NPTF thread with one O-ring installed, for diesel engines with serial number 931164 through 1452885)
Turbocharger oil fitting assembly (with two O-rings installed, for diesel engines with serial numbers 1452886 and above)

geninfo.para: The turbocharger oil connector assembly (which has a 1/4 - inch NPTF thread and one fitting to tube O-ring) is to be used on diesel engines with serial numbers 931164 through 1452885 (excluding the diesel engines listed in the note). The turbocharger oil fitting assembly (which has two O-rings installed) is to be used on diesel engines with serial numbers 1452886 and up (excluding the diesel engines listed in the note).

note.para: The turbocharger oil feed tube kit is NOT used on the following applications:

item.para: DT 466 and DT 530 diesel engines with serial numbers 1194039 and up and equipped with an EVRT® turbocharger.
DT 466, DT 570, and HT 570 diesel engines with serial numbers 2,000,001 and up.

geninfo.para: When cleaning or replacing the turbocharger inlet tube assembly, be sure to insert the cap plug into the turbocharger oil feed port. The cap plug will stop any of the old gasket material from falling into the turbocharger as it is being removed. Don't forget to remove and discard the plastic cap plug after gasket surface has been cleaned.

note.para: The rigid oil supply tube and fitting have been removed from stock. The turbocharger oil supply tube kit replaces the rigid tube and fitting in service.

figure.caption: Figure 3. Turbocharger and Oil Cooler Header

note.para: The turbocharger oil connector assembly and the turbocharger oil fitting assembly have different installation procedures. Refer to the instruction sheet within the kit, for correct installation procedure.

geninfo.para: Also released, is a new turbocharger oil tube seal kit (part number 1850127C91). This kit is to be used on all I-6 inline diesel engines with a starting serial number of 931164 and up. The kit contains all seals required to service all combinations of O-rings and seals on the turbocharger oil inlet tube.

note.para: Discard any extra parts left in the kit once the turbocharger oil tube seal has been serviced.

geninfo.para: The turbocharger oil tube seal kit consists of the following parts:
